page.title: 02MAIN FEATURES OF OUR AREA
page.content: In our area there are a few commercial businesses mainly situated in the {BARGEDDIE}and{CROSSHILL}districts. They are Finning -agents for the Caterpiller Tractors, Vibroplant,Air Products, Prospect Tool Hire, B&Q, Queensway, Budget Van Hire,Clarkston Commercials, Marshall's Chunky Chicken factory and the Bargeddie Depot for Council Vans. Some of our local residents work in these companies. The{Baillieston Interchange}also lies within our area.Motorways spread throughout Scotland from this busy and vital junction.
